Mendokusai

Tartarus

GSL RO8

[ esports  ]

27 Mar 2019

Today is the first day of the GSL RO8 in 2019 and I am very excited. I am naturally a little sad that there are no non-Koreans this season, but there are a few potential underdog stories to make up for it, especially given that the likes of soO, INnoVation, Stats and sOs are already out. Will Maru continue his insane string of GSL wins, or will someone finally dethrone him?
